p: The concatenated alignments of all IAV proteins were visualized in 3D Cartesian coordinates. For this, a matrix of pairwise distances from the concatenated protein alignments was computed using Fitch similarity matrix and then the Kruskalâ€™s non-metric multidimensional scaling available in MASS package version 7.3.50 [ 72] for R software was applied to place each record of the concatenated protein sequences in a 3D space.
